attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I wish to petition the Priminster to issue people who served in the N.A.A.F.I during the last war with a button.
Bevin boys and the Land Army Girls have been given one, so why not my mother and other people who are still alive.These people surely deserve one as they fed and watered the troops.
I/We think they should be acknowledged for the part they played,"They also serve who only stand and Wait".
Thankyou we also have pictures as proof!!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
